org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 RedisConnectionCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    DefaultedRedisClusterConnection, DefaultedRedisConnection, RedisClusterConnection, RedisCommands, RedisConnection, StringRedisConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    org.springframework.data.redis.connection.AbstractRedisConnection, DefaultStringRedisConnection, JedisClusterConnection, JedisConnection, LettuceClusterConnection, LettuceConnection

    public interface RedisConnectionCommands
    Connection-specific commands supported by Redis.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      byte[] echo(byte[] message)
      Returns message via server roundtrip.
      String ping()
      Test connection.
      void select(int dbIndex)
      Select the DB with given positive dbIndex.

    • 方法详细资料

      • select

        void select(int dbIndex)
        Select the DB with given positive dbIndex.
        参数:
        dbIndex - the database index.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: SELECT

      • echo

        @Nullable
byte[] echo(byte[] message)
        Returns message via server roundtrip.
        参数:
        message - the message to echo.
        返回:
        the message or null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: ECHO

      • ping

        @Nullable
String ping()
        Test connection.
        返回:
        Server response message - usually PONG. null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: PING
